name: @case-app/schematics
description: Set of schematics for CASE Framework

scripts.move: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/server-schematics/files && cp -ar ./src/server-schematics/files/* dist/server-schematics/files && mkdir -p dist/server-schematics/seeder-files && cp -ar ./src/server-schematics/seeder-files/* dist/server-schematics/seeder-files && mkdir -p dist/client-schematics/files && cp -ar ./src/client-schematics/files/* dist/client-schematics/files
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish

author: Buddyweb
